name: Christmas Eve Gift Rush
description:
This is a game that I made for the Extra Credits Holiday 2018 Game Jam as a solo developer. I utilized the Phaser Engine to develop this game and this is the first game that I have made in this engine. I hope you enjoy it and have a Merry Christmas, Happy Hannukah, a Kick-Ass Kwanza, a Superb Solstice, a Happy New Year, and a Festivus for the Rest of Us.

Music Credits:

ovenrake - Deck the Halls

This song is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike License.

This song can be downloaded at https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Various_Artists_Rushcoil/XMAS_Compilation_201...

No changes were made to this song
